devdoc.details: Contract that acts as an operator contract.

safeBatchTransferFrom(address,address,ad.details: transfer objects from different ids to specified address

params._data: Data to pass to onERC1155Received() function if recipient is contract Note:  Arrays should be sorted so that all ids in a same bin are adjacent (more efficient).
params._from: The address to batchTransfer objects from.
params._ids: Array of ids to update balance of
params._to: The address to batchTransfer objects to.
params._tokenAddress: The address of the token contract to call
params._values: Array of amount of object per id to be transferred.

safeTransferFrom(address,address,address.details: Allow _from or an operator to transfer tokens from one address to another

params._data: Data to pass to onERC1155Received() function if recipient is contract
params._from: The address which you want to send tokens from
params._id: token id to update balance of
params._to: The address which you want to transfer to
params._tokenAddress: The address of the token contract to call
params._value: The amount of tokens of provided token ID to be transferred
